content:
Sure, here's a sample pitch that could be used for an initial cold call:

"Hello, my name is John and I'm calling from XYZ company. I noticed that your business specializes in [insert industry here], and I wanted to see if our product could be a good fit for your needs.

We've developed a software solution that helps businesses like yours [insert specific benefit here], which can help save time and increase productivity. We've had great success with other companies in your industry, and I believe our product could be a valuable asset to your business.

Would you be interested in scheduling a brief call to learn more about our product and see if it could be a good fit for your needs? If so, I'd be happy to set up a time that works for you.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to speaking with you soon."
